entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
